name: The Dandelion Knight
description:
As young 5 year old Kara is going through a rough patch in her life, take control of her fictional character The Dandelion Knight as they embark on a series of perilous fantasy adventures.

Credits:

Rohan Teredesai - Producer, Writer.

Kayla Schroter - Art.

J.Choi - Art.

Carl J. Sorenson - Audio.

Granville Jones - Game Designer.

Jacob Manels - Programmer.

 

Note: Game is still in whitebox phase.

Controls:

A-B - move.

Space (Grounded) - Jump.

Space (Air) (Hold) - Glide.

Mouse Click - Attack.

 

Whitebox Legend:

Frog - Charging enemy, moves towards player when close, damage on impact.

Wasp - Flying enemy, flies in patrol, shoots projectile at player when close, projectile does damage but impact with wasp does not.

Green Square - Bush, blocks path, destroyed with sword attack.

Yellow Square - Wind current, moves player upwards when player glides.

Purple Square - First level boss, shoots projectiles and charges at player. Defeating boss ends level.

Green Circle - Second level collectibles, collecting all ends level.

Red Square - Third level boss, chases player and defeats them instantly on impact, cannot be fought, only run away from.
